text: Allaha ani tyacya paigambaratarphe haja akabara (mothya haja) cya divasi1 sapha ailana ahe ki allaha anekesvaravadyampasuna vibhakta aheta ani tyaca paigambaradekhila. Jara attahi tumhi tauba (ksama-yacana) karala tara tumacyasathi adhika cangale ahe ani jara tumhi tonda phiravala, tara januna asa ki tumhi allahala agatika karu sakata nahi ani kaphiranna sakta sikseci khabara dya
